text: The Bandit () is a 1946 Italian crime drama movie directed by Alberto Lattuada and starring Anna Magnani, Amedeo Nazzari, Carla Del Poggio, Carlo Campanini. ==Other websites== * Category:1946 war movies Category:1946 crime drama movies Category:Italian crime movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Alberto Lattuada
title: The Bandit (1946 movie)
